key.name: window-navigator-left
key.summary: Navigate to window on the left
key.description: Move focus to the nearest window on the left

key.name: window-navigator-right
key.summary: Navigate to window on the right
key.description: Move focus to the nearest window on the right

key.name: window-navigator-up
key.description: Move focus to the nearest window above

key.name: window-navigator-down
key.description: Move focus to the nearest window below
